cells.description: Download Front-End as JS Script (Static Web)

threats.title: Possibly target of DDOS on single target
threats.description: For static web front will be target for attacker to operate DDOS for bring front-end out-of-service

threats.title: Unauthorize request for update/delete static file
threats.description: As static file was allowed accessible from public network. Attacker possible to mitigate and update/delete static file with malicious file for spread to client

threats.title: Possibly target of DDOS on single target
threats.description: Attacker can operate DDOS to Minio as static file for make it out-of-service and risk to public ip will get into black list

threats.title: Vulnerability assessment for RestAPI
threats.description: Need process to check vulnerability/security enhancement for make sure nodejs have properly secure configuration enough for operate on production (A6:Security Misconfiguration)

threats.title: Penetration testing for RestAPI
threats.description: Unauthorize access to RestAPI will make attacker can stolen sensitive information and critical transaction operate (A2:Broken Authentication)

threats.title: Lack of Module Log and Monitoring
threats.description: Lack of module log and monitoring will make security bind and hard to track when attack event occur (A10: Insufficient Logging & Monitoring)

threats.title: Validation for deserialize data from web browser
threats.description: All restapi need to validate data come from browser for make sure all data receive was validated (A8: Insecure Deserialization)

threats.title: Out-of-date mobile device's version cause vulnerability on OS
threats.description: Android and IOS with out-of-date version will bring huge of "know vulnerability" and  make device infected (A9: Know Vulnerability)

threats.title: Sensitive data classification
threats.description: Any information cache, databaselite store on mobile need to classified (A3:Sensitive data classification)

threats.title: DNS Cache Poisoning
threats.description: Attacker from outside can attack for redirect traffic of user to malicious web front, restfulapi. This can bring customer's information leak/infected and finally indirect attack to online banking system

threats.title: DNS Attack for Denied of Service
threats.description: For indirect attack system. Attacker can positioning to attack dns server instend of system directly. This make client unable to access system due to dns cannot be resolve

threats.title: Single factor authentication
threats.description: Authentication with single factor may bring risk for authorize access. If attacker stolen credential from user side/bruce force/forget password funcation as A2 Broken Authentication on OWASP

threats.title: Out-of-Data Web Browser cause arbility code execution (ACE)
threats.description: Old web browser and never update may cause many vulnerability for allow attacker run "arbitrary code execution" on target machine. This will bring client to repudiation for access system and increase risk for system security

threats.title: Unclassified web browser access to system
threats.description: Many web browser will bring problem for control security standard and a lot of them is discontinoute support from product owner (Such as Internet Explorer etc). This may cause mitigated client with know vulnerability for access system (A9: Know Vulnerability)

threats.title: Sensitive data classification
threats.description: Any data leave on browser/cookie need to classified and prevent sensitive data (A3:Sensitive Data Explosure)
